title: The Merchants' Guild Rising
description: A regional arc focusing on the growing influence of merchant guilds in the eastern provinces. Political intrigue and economic manipulation threaten the traditional power structures.
narrative_summary: The Merchants' Guild has been systematically gaining political influence through economic pressure and strategic alliances. Their ultimate goal is to establish a merchant republic in the eastern provinces.
objectives: Determine the scope of their influence
Decide whether to support or oppose their goals
player_impact: Moderate - affects player's reputation with merchant and noble factions
world_impact: Significant - could reshape power structure in eastern provinces
